text: Faurea macnaughtonii (Terblanz beech) is a species of tree in the family Proteaceae. It is found in South Africa and Eswatini, and was named in honour of Colin B. MacNaughton, Conservator of Forests at Knysna during the 1890s.Immelman, W. F. E., et al. Our Green Heritage: The South African Book of Trees. Tafelberg. 1973. ==References== macnaughtonii Category:Conservation dependent plants Category:Flora of South Africa Category:Flora of Swaziland Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Faurea macnaughtonii
